text:
="preserve">John Angelo DiBiaggio (September 11, 1932 – February 1, 2020) was an American educator. He was the President of the University of Connecticut from 1979 to 1985, then of Michigan State University from 1985 to 1992, and of Tufts University from 1992 to 2001. He was born in Houston, Texas.
DiBiaggio died on February 1, 2020 at the age of 87.
